entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 16.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 16. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Light snow changing to flurries at times heavy near noon. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 24 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
